item.title: Grok Attributes Surge In Sexual Images To Lapse In Safeguards: Says xAI Is Urgently Fixing
item.description: The clarification comes on the heels of the chatbot creating sexualised images of children in response to user prompts.

item.title: Tesla's Energy Business Might Be Its Saving Grace As EV Deliveries Drop
item.description: Tesla deployed a record amount of energy storage in the fourth quarter, the company said on Friday.

item.title: Dan Ives Says Tech Stocks Could Rally Up To 25% In 2026, But Cautions That This Is A ‘Prove It Year’ For AI: Report
item.description: The analyst said that AI is at an inflection point now and that it is about the second, third, and fourth-order derivatives playing out from here on.

item.title: Tesla Analysts Shrug Off Q4 Delivery Dip — Say AI, Robotaxi And Full Self-Driving Are The Real Bet
item.description: Tesla shares fell despite analysts describing Q4 deliveries as largely neutral and influenced by the U.S. EV tax credit expiry.

item.title: Bitmine Immersion Stock Is Soaring Today – What’s Behind The Rally?
item.description: Bitmine’s Tom Lee has urged shareholders to approve the 50 billion authorized share increase plan at its upcoming annual meeting on January 15.
